indian-ocean.name: Indian Ocean
indian-ocean.description: Luxury diving with pristine reefs and abundant marine life
indian-ocean.bestTime: November–April for best conditions, varies by region.

maldives.name: Maldives
maldives.description: Iconic atolls, manta rays, whale sharks, and luxury liveaboards.
maldives.bestTime: November–April for best visibility and weather.

seychelles.name: Seychelles
seychelles.description: Granite islands, coral reefs, and big pelagic encounters.
seychelles.bestTime: March–May and October–November for best diving.

mauritius.name: Mauritius
mauritius.description: Wrecks, coral gardens, and year-round warm water diving.

sri-lanka.name: Sri Lanka
sri-lanka.description: Wrecks, blue whales, and vibrant reefs off the teardrop island.

madagascar.name: Madagascar
madagascar.description: Remote reefs, whale sharks, and unique marine biodiversity.

reunion.name: Réunion
reunion.description: Volcanic island diving, lava flows, and coral reefs.

chagos.name: Chagos Archipelago
chagos.description: Pristine, protected atolls with limited access and untouched reefs.

cocos-islands.name: Cocos (Keeling) Islands
cocos-islands.description: Remote Australian territory with clear water and healthy reefs.

christmas-island.name: Christmas Island
christmas-island.description: Steep drop-offs, whale sharks, and unique red crab migrations.

india.name: India
india.description: Diverse diving from the Andaman Islands to Lakshadweep and Goa.

andaman-islands.name: Andaman Islands
andaman-islands.description: Remote archipelago with world-class reefs, wrecks, and big pelagics.

havelock-island.name: Havelock Island
havelock-island.description: India's most famous dive destination, with vibrant reefs and elephants on the beach.

lakshadweep.name: Lakshadweep
lakshadweep.description: Coral atolls, turquoise lagoons, and excellent visibility off India's west coast.

goa.name: Goa
goa.description: Wrecks, shallow reefs, and beginner-friendly diving on India's southwest coast.
